title: The top 10 OP champions should have a hunger games.
body:
Essentially this.

The top 10 champions we currently consider to be overpowered will have an intermediate AI version made. They will all spawn in dominion at level 18 with full build. The AI's goal will be to kill the other AI without dying.

The winner, or last one standing, will receive Riot's blessing and avoid nerfs till the next games. The other 9 will receive a beating by the nerf bat.

Um, no.  Kalista would have NO ult.  There is no way she wins that with Vi in the pool.

Ahri does not lose to Zed.  That's one of the reasons she is a first pick in the LCS now.  She has high damage since the buffs, and she is extremely mobile.  They both hit six and Zed can't assassinate her because she is actually more mobile than him.  All she has to do is dash away, charm back at him, and blow him up, using the other two dashes to dodge away from him chasing or casting Q.

Azir at level 18 with full build ABSOLUTELY makes the top 3.  NOBODY in the pool can even get close to him.  Despite having skillshots, Kalista can't take him on because his range with soldiers is greater than hers, and he'll literally two-shot her.  No one in the pool outranges him, and all the melees with gap-closers get destroyed by his ult.  Only Zed would have a shot, and he'd have to get the jump on Azir with Azir's ult on cooldown.
Why would Vi target the Kalista first? She'd get targeted by the others while she's distracted by Kalista and then after killing her would have no ult to use on anyone else.
